fields.name: Thespian Gallop (C1)
fields.value: Opening Flourish's CD is decreased by 18%.

fields.name: Myriad Mise-En-Scène (C2)
fields.value: After Cliffbreaker's Banner is unleashed, all nearby party members' Normal Attack DMG is increased by 15% for 12s.

fields.name: Seafaring General (C3)
fields.value:
Increases the Level of Cliffbreaker's Banner by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

fields.name: Flower and a Fighter (C4)
fields.value: When Yun Jin triggers the Crystallize Reaction, her DEF is increased by 20% for 12s.

fields.name: Famed Throughout the Land (C5)
fields.value:
Increases the Level of Opening Flourish by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

fields.name: Decorous Harmony (C6)
fields.value: Characters under the effects of the Flying Cloud Flag Formation have their Normal ATK SPD increased by 12%.

description: A renowned Liyue opera singer who is skilled in both playwriting and singing. Her style is one-of-a-kind, exquisite and delicate, much like the person herself.
title: Yun Jin
